Detailed Description

This class is used to propose to the user modify their options. If the Plugins inherits from this interface the XinxPluginSelector propose automatically a custom button.

The Plugin create a wigdet contains the user interface, and have two method for put and get the configuration in the dialog.

Xinx create the dialog with the Ok and Cancel button.
